message: Let's split it fairly, I get a bit more
Your share is decreasing faster than mine. Let's be practical and split it fairly while it's still worthwhile for you.
I'll meet you halfway on the last offer, but I still need a bit more
Time is running out, Alice. This is a good deal for both of us. Let's settle before we both lose more.
I'll take a smaller share than before, but I still think I deserve more than you're offering
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Take this offer before inflation eats away at your share even more.
